description: A whimsical tale of a math book from the 18th century, confident in its resolved problems.
title: Solved Mysteries of Math
n_1: In a cozy corner of the library, Max discovers an old math book.
n_2: Max flips through the pages, each filled with solved problems.
n_3: Max finds humor in the way problems are presented and solved.
n_4: Max is amazed by the book's confidence, despite its age.
c1_1: What's this? An ancient math book!
c2_1: [The book greetings Max, exuding an air of mystery.]
c1_2: Wow, all these problems are solved!
c2_2: [The book seems to puff up with pride at its contents.]
c1_3: Ha! These old problems are so cleverly solved!
c2_3: [The book appears to bask in Max's amusement.]
c1_4: This book knows it's full of problems, but all are solved!
c2_4: [The book stands out among others, proud of its legacy.]
